to enjoying celebratory meals or special occasions
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it comes to enjoying celebratory meals or special occasions?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking, wasting resources and neglecting my body's true needs?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did I allow myself to become excessive in eating and drinking, thereby demonstrating an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejecting the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I used excessive and wasteful spending on leisure activities to take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: for providing for my family 's needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively and wastefully risked funds designated for providing for my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: through phone calls , video chats , or social gatherings
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, when engaging with friends or family members through phone calls, video chats, or social gatherings?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I allow my rest on Sunday to be disrupted by unnecessary work?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did I engage in work on a Sunday, unnecessarily burdening others with my presence?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
